external_games.name: Evil Dead: The Game - Army of Darkness Bundle

name: Evil Dead: The Game - Army of Darkness Bundle
summary: Celebrate the release of the Army of Darkness update in Evil Dead: The Game with the Army of Darkness Medieval Bundle: Henry The Red's Scottish Vibe Outfit, Lord Arthur's Battle Prep Outfit, and The Gilded Attire costume pack for the Necromancer Demon army
